org.mitre.taxii.query

Class DefaultQueryXml

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.taxii.query.DefaultQueryXml

  • public final class DefaultQueryXml
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a JAXB environment for TAXII Default Query objects similar to what TaxiiXml provides. This class is slightly different in that Schematron conformance is not supported (as of this writing there were no Schematron rules for queries). This class also contains a DefaultQueryInfo field that contains the query object to be operated on whereas in TaxiiXml the JAXB object is kept separate.
